mapper.select: SELECT u.userId AS userId ,u.userPw AS userPw ,u.userName AS userName ,u.userLevelCode AS userLevelCode ,l.userLevelName AS userLevelName ,l.mainBusinessCode AS mainBusinessCode ,b.businessName AS businessName FROM k1_tb_user AS u INNER JOIN k1_tb_user_level AS l ON u.userLevelCode = l.userLevelCode INNER JOIN k1_tb_main_business AS b ON l.mainBusinessCode = b.mainBusinessCode WHERE userId = #{userId};
SELECT * FROM k1_tb_login AS l JOIN k1_tb_main_business AS b ON l.mainBusinessCode = b.mainBusinessCode;
SELECT loginCode ,mainBusinessCode ,loginId ,loginDate ,logoutDate FROM k1_tb_login ORDER BY loginCode DESC LIMIT 0,5 ;
SELECT loginCode ,mainBusinessCode ,loginId ,loginDate ,logoutDate FROM k1_tb_login WHERE loginCode = #{loginCode};
